column5: Good day all, haven't been on the board in a long while, just wanted to say hello and happy fishing. Cheers!
Hi Hillrat, welcome back...i'm a newbie but loving the forum.
Yeyyeee Mcmayostein!  Got something going this Sunday?  I think we're about due for a spit session.  HD
Welcome back Hillrat.   Dare I ask Highdrifter????

MUAHahahahah!!  That's an insider TJ.  Hillrat and I got back a ways..  Lucid, Hillrat and myself used to hit a mcdonalds after all our fishing trips.  Call it a tradition based on superstition.  We used to call ouselves the Mctrio, remember?  Mayo is his favourite side dish.. LOL  I should be careful though.. He's got some dirt mcgirt on me that I'm sure he's itching to post.  HD
I believe Lucid is the mayo fanatic actually, I just seem to be a bit messier with it lol. And HD you can post that pic again all you want, but Donkey Love will be quick to follow...
